summary: DevOps Engineer and Bachelor of Computer Science student at Dalhousie University with a focus on building reliable systems at the intersection of automation, infrastructure, and deployment. Experienced in full-stack development, API integration, and creating custom solutions for real estate and management workflows.

skills.label: Languages
skills.value: TypeScript, JavaScript, Java, PHP, Python, SQL, HTML/CSS, Liquid

skills.label: Frameworks & Libraries
skills.value: Next.js, React.js, Express.js, Prisma ORM, Kysely

skills.label: Tools & Platforms
skills.value: Bun, WordPress, PostgreSQL, Docker, Linux, Git, REST APIs, Google Sheets API, Google Drive API, Google Maps API, GatewayAPI, Active Directory, Zoho API

bullets: Built internal email template management tool using Express.js with custom React.js interface
Integrated Zoho API to autofill employee personal information for email templates
Built Flash SMS notification system with Next.js and TypeScript, integrated with GatewayAPI and PostgreSQL
Deployed self-hosted production server using Docker containers on a Linux VM
Integrated Windows Active Directory for school-wide authentication
Integrated PHP and JavaScript with WordPress Advanced Custom Fields for Sitings.ca
Contributed to Shopify theme development using Liquid
Worked on Beautifi web app using React.js with PostgreSQL and Kysely query builder
Developing a comprehensive customer management and go-kart booking system to automate business operations
Utilizing TypeScript, Next.js, and Prisma to create a scalable full-stack architecture
Implementing features for customer data handling, session scheduling, and resource allocation
Developed a flash SMS sending system for staff at ETPZP high school to streamline internal communication
Architected a robust backend using Next.js, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL to handle message queuing and delivery
Deployed the solution on a self-hosted Linux server utilizing Docker for containerized environment management
Built a real estate location analysis and site selection tool to assist in property assessment
Integrated PHP and JavaScript with WordPress Advanced Custom Fields (ACF) to deliver dynamic data visualization
Optimized the platform for performance, enabling efficient filtering and display of real estate data
Designed and built a workout tracker with a Google Sheets backend to minimize friction in logging exercises
Implemented logic to automatically calculate progressive overload, helping track fitness improvements over time
Created a user-friendly interface focused on speed and ease of use during training sessions
